Name: Relief of Offering Bearers
Description: This fragment of a relief shows offering bearers, although the principal figure is now missing. Seven men and women stand in a row and are shown with their offerings, which include baskets carried on their heads, geese, fish, and jars. In front of them, a seated scribe with his writing tools registers the offerings. Above the scribe, a short title reads "Horus, the Protector of his Father."
